description:
We should do some light pep8 checks.

There are several of the current default flake8 checks that fail for the python 2.4 code in the plugins, but we should still try and check the obvious stuff.
title: xenapi: need to pep8 check plugins

comments.content:

There are several of the current default flake8 checks that fail for the python 2.4 code in the plugins, but we should still try and check the obvious stuff.
